name: Dental Implant
description: Implants provide a strong foundation for permanent or removable teeth and can be made to look like your natural teeth.

name: Teeth Polishing
description: Tooth polishing is a painless dental procedure, and some patients enjoy it. The dental hygienist usually uses a small, soft rubber cup and polishing paste.

name: Root Canalling
description: Root canals are needed for a cracked tooth from injury or genetics, a deep cavity, or issues from a previous filling.

name: Teeth Whitening
description: Teeth with a natural yellow shade will generally whiten in 2 weeks,and blue/grey shade can take twice as long.

name: Extraction Milk Tooth
description: Early removal of milk tooth can lead to the fact that neighboring teeth will start occupying its place.

name: Pulp Capping
description: Direct pulp capping should be used only on a vital pulp that has been accidentally injured and shows no other symptoms.
